Title: Replicating and Re-Evaluating the Theory of Relative Defect-Proneness

Name: Chrome
Eclipse
Firefox
Netbeans
Dates: initial commit to each source code repository and June 24, 2010

UseOF-SZZ: to determine which revisions are defect introducing.
Summary: It presents the details necessary to use survival analysis in the context of defect modelling (such details were missing from the original paper by Koru et al.)
Outcome:
defect density has an inverted “U” shaped pattern. their findings generally agree with the results of Koru 
    et al., who found that defect density decreases as module size increases.
